message: I miss the Russell Beattie "Notebook" days.
I've only read about that... I'll have to remember to check out his insane ravings at some point.
Unfortunately, it's a brave new world where @CharlieSheen has 1.7 million followers  WTF
I appreciate how you can respect the iPad2, even though your not an Apple fan in general.  That's legit.  (Vs somebody like Gruber where you know what his opinion is going to be)
I'm in a debate with a buddy of mine over MacBook Air vs iPad for mobile professionals.  (technical pre-sales).  He's going the MBA route, I'm going the iPad route.
Testing - oh yeah I forgot that I'd tried this convore thing before - at first I was a little confused on how they had a handle and a picture for me
Coming in loud and clear, jcook <over>
Do you think Ustream can handle the load for the @CharlieSheen streamcast tonight?  http://twitter.com/#!/Scobleizer/status/44156147682377728
